Whether it be for stocking stuffers, corporate gifts, or a little something for co-workers, gift cards are great, maybe a candle or a bottle of wine – I can very much appreciate any of those things, but there’s not many things sweeter than unwrapping a gift to find Apple packaging hiding underneath.
